tool_description: Analyzes installation requirements, complexity, and estimated costs for bathroom fixtures.

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to analyze installation requirements for

diy_skill_level.description: DIY skill level: beginner, intermediate, advanced

professional_rates.description: Local professional installation rate per hour in USD

error_messages: Invalid skill level: Use one of [beginner, intermediate, advanced]
Invalid professional rate: Rate must be a positive number between 25 and 200
Installation data unavailable: Some products may not have complete installation requirement data
usage: Provide product_ids to analyze. Specify diy_skill_level for DIY feasibility assessment and professional_rates for cost estimation.

complexity_levels.description: Array of installation complexity levels: simple, moderate, complex, professional_only

estimated_hours.description: Array of estimated installation hours for each product

required_tools.description: Array of required tool lists for each product installation

professional_costs.description: Array of estimated professional installation costs for each product

diy_feasible.description: Array indicating if DIY installation is feasible for given skill level
